post.summary: create: Create a new Practitioner instance

delete.summary: delete: Perform a logical delete on a Practitioner instance

requestBody.description: Patch to apply to a FHIR Practitioner record

put.summary: update,create: Update or Create a Practitioner instance

get.summary: vread: Read Practitioner instance with specific version

post.summary: operation: This operation takes a meta, and adds the profiles, tags, and security labels found in it to the nominated resource
operation: This operation takes a meta, and deletes the profiles, tags, and security labels found in it from the nominated resource

operation: This operation retrieves a summary of the profiles, tags, and security labels for the given scope; e.g. for each scope:  

* system-wide: a list of all profiles, tags and security labels in use by the system 
* resource-type level: A list of all profiles, tags, and security labels for the resource type 
* individual resource level: A list of all profiles, tags, and security labels for the current version of the resource.  Also, as a special case, this operation (and other meta operations) can be performed on a historical version of a resource)

operation: This operation retrieves a summary of the profiles, tags, and security labels for the given scope; e.g. for each scope:  

* system-wide: a list of all profiles, tags and security labels in use by the system 
* resource-type level: A list of all profiles, tags, and security labels for the resource type 
* individual resource level: A list of all profiles, tags, and security labels for the current version of the resource.  Also, as a special case, this operation (and other meta operations) can be performed on a historical version of a resource)

Practitioner.description: A person with a  formal responsibility in the provisioning of healthcare or related services

OperationOutcome.description: Information about the success/failure of an action

_content.name: _content
_content.description: Search on the entire content of the resource

_in.name: _in
_in.description: Allows for the retrieval of resources that are active members of a CareTeam, Group, or List

_list.name: _list

_source.name: _source
_source.description: Identifies where the resource comes from

_text.name: _text
_text.description: Perform searches against the narrative content of a resource

_contained.name: _contained
_contained.description: Request different types of handling for contained resources

_count.name: _count
_count.description: Limit the number of match results per page of response

_graph.name: _graph
_graph.description: Include additional resources according to a GraphDefinition

_include.name: _include
_include.description: Include additional resources, based on following links forward across references

_revinclude.name: _revinclude
_revinclude.description: Include additional resources, based on following reverse links across references

_sort.name: _sort
_sort.description: Request which order results should be returned in

_total.name: _total
_total.description: Request a precision of the total number of results for a request
